bibdata.title: Supplement to IEEE Standard for Information Technology-Software Reuse-Data Model for Reuse Library Interoperability: Asset Certification Framework
Supplement to IEEE Standard for Information Technology-Software Reuse-Data Model for Reuse Library Interoperability: Asset Certification Framework

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A consistent structure for describing a reuse library's asset certification policy in terms of an Asset Certification Framework is defined, along with a standard interoperability data model for interchange of asset certification information.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
